about_the_game:
Opening/Ending Theme EP for Momoiro Closet.
The tracks are available in both MP3 and WAV (high-quality) format.


1. Voila! Magic Closet
Vocals: Haruko Momoi
Lyrics&Music: Haruko Momoi
Arrangement: Haraddy

2. To The Next Level
Vocals: Chiaki Hashimoto
Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima
Composition & Arrangement: Yuuki Xano from STRIKERS



WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
MP3:128kbps
